1.0.name: wordpress/all-in-one-google-plus-widget
1.0.description:
This simple WordPress widget will add Google like button, Google Follow me button for user profile and Share page button for any of your website URL.There are many options which are configurable in admin widget area.Its easy to setup.

Checkout my plugin in action :

http://milap.site90.net/wordpress/

If you have any question regarding plugin, mail me on cemilap.88@gmail.com or add me on facebook.com/milap112. I will reply you as soon as possible.

God bless you..!!
